title: Group portrait including hostesses Bunny Allen, Tula Woodson, Odessa Smith, Marilla Taylor and Mrs. Major wearing dark gown; waitresses Mrs. O. Lloyd, Melba Guyton, Dorothy Turner, Gladys Hones, Ross Beatty, Hazel Blue, Matilda Jackson, Lillian Works, Helen Purdy, Annabell Betts, Mell Isenhaur, Annetta Clayton, Agnes Simms, Willa Ellis, Gladys Beverly, Nola Gloater, Sara Darby and Sara Belle Lee; chefs Norman Burton, Charles Porter and George Oliver; and Othur Taylor and William Woodson wearing tuxedos, posed around table in Central Baptist Church for banquet in honor of Rev. medium: black and white: Agfa Safety Film
